SA15dhkprviu:0_0: r1: d anvayam āpādayati / pratiṣedhaniṣedhasya vidhānarūpatvāt* /
SA15dhkprviu:0_1: asataḥ sapakṣān na nivṛttir ity asapakṣa eva nāstīti cet* /
SA15dhkprviu:0_2: neti saiva nivṛtter nirvṛttiḥ asataḥ katham iṣṭā /
SA15dhkprviu:1_0: 2: 'saty apy asti / bhāvapratiṣedhas tu na saṃbhavatīty askhalitaprajño devānāṃpriyo yas tadviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ necchati /
SA15dhkprviu:2_0: 3: arthāntare / tena neha pratanyate / na cāsann ātmā sattāsādhanavṛtteḥ sandigdhaḥ syāt* /
SA15dhkprviu:3_0: 4: na copagamabalena sapakṣāsapakṣau vyavasthāpya pramāṇapravartanaṃ yuktam* /
SA15dhkprviu:4_0: 5: syāt* prāṇādīnāṃ / ātmanaḥ sandehāt* / ata eva vipakṣād api / ekatra hi niyame siddhe 'nyanivartanaṃ
SA15dhkprviu:5_0: v1: sidhyet* / anyathā kvacid dṛṣṭe 'bhāvasidhāv api syād evādṛṣṭe saṃśayaḥ /
SA15dhkprviu:5_1: tathā hy asakalavyaktibhedavyāpino 'py arthāḥ kecit tajjātisaṃbhavino dṛṣṭāḥ pārthivālohalekhyavat* /
SA15dhkprviu:6_2: ātmapratiniyame hi tatkāryātmatayā prāṇādīnāṃ nairātmyena saha virodhaḥ
SA15dhkprviu:7_0: 3: syāt* / sa ca na sidhyatīty uktam* / astu nāma nirātmakebhyo vyatirekaḥ prāṇādīnāṃ tadbhāve ca nairātmyavyāvṛttiḥ /
SA15dhkprviu:8_0: 4: bhāvam icchati / yathā vyatirekābhave 'pi sapakṣe prāṇādir neṣṭaḥ /
SA15dhkprviu:9_0: 5: na prāṇādisaṃbhavena nairātmyavyāvartanād ātmagati / kiṃ tarhi vidhimukhenaiva prāṇādayaḥ
